name: 甘奈
text: わぁ～……
trans: Aah...

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃん、見て見て！
こことか超良い景色だよ～！
trans: Tenka, look! This one has a really great view!

name: 甜花
text:
わあ……
すごい、自然だね……綺麗……
trans: Aah... Amazing, it has a picturesque view... It's beautiful...

name: 甘奈
text:
だよねだよね！　……あっ！
落ち葉を使って焼き芋もできるんだって～
trans: I know, right? Ah! It says that we can roast some sweet potatoes using the fallen leaves.

name: 甜花
text:
焼き芋……！
甜花、焼き芋食べたい……！
trans: Roast sweet potato? Tenka would want to eat one!

name: 甘奈
text:
めっちゃ甘いって書いてあるよ～
これ、絶っ対、やろうね！
trans: It also mentions that it's really sweet! We should do this, right!

name: 甜花
text:
うん……！
にへへ……美味しく、できるといいな……
trans: Yes! Nihehe... It'd be nice... if the ones we make turn out delicious...

name: 甘奈
text: えへへ、ママなら上手に焼いてくれそうだね☆
trans: Ehehe... Mama's probably able to make them nicely.

name: 甜花
text:
うん……
にへへ……
trans: That's true... Nihehe...

name: 甘奈
text: あっ……！　噂をすればママからだよ！
trans: Ah! Speaking of which, it is her!

name: 甘奈
text:
もしもし……うん、甜花ちゃんも隣にいるよ？
どうしたのー？
trans: Hello. Yes, Tenka's right beside me. Is something wrong?

name: 甘奈
text:
…………
うん、そっか
trans: ...Oh, I see.

name: 甘奈
text:
……ううん、謝らないで！
パパ、今忙しいもんね！
trans: ...No, it's alright! Papa's busy too, right?

name: 甘奈
text: むしろ、パパとママも楽しみにしてたから残念……
trans: It's really a shame since you two were also looking forward to it.

name: 甘奈
text:
わかった！　甜花ちゃんにも伝えておくね！
バイバイ！
trans: Okay! I'll tell Tenka! Bye-bye!

name: 甜花
text:
えっと……
もしかして、旅行の話、だった……？
trans: Umm... was that about the trip?

name: 甘奈
text: ……うん
trans: ...Yeah.

name: 甘奈
text:
でも、お仕事だもん……しょうがないよね！
ふたりが行けないなら、今回は中止かな
trans: But, it's work... So, there's nothing much we can do about it! If they won't be able to come, I guess we should put this off for now.

name: 甘奈
text: 甘奈たちだけで楽しんじゃったら悪いもんね……
trans: It won't be right if it'll be just the two of us enjoying that trip.

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃん、代わりにどっか行こっか！
trans: Tenka, how about we go somewhere else instead?

name: 甜花
text: なーちゃん……
trans: Naa-chan...

name: 甘奈
text: 甘奈、ちょっと気になってたとこがあって……
trans: There's this place that I kinda want to check out.

name: 甜花
text: あ、あのね……なーちゃん……！
trans: E-Erm... Naa-chan...

name: 甘奈
text: ……甜花ちゃん？
trans: Tenka?

name: 甜花
text:
甜花も、みんなで……旅行、行きたかったから……
パパとママ……行けなくて、ちょっと、がっかり……
trans: Tenka really... wants to go on a trip... Hearing Papa and Mama not being able to make it... makes Tenka sad...

name: 甜花
text:
なーちゃんも、すごく楽しみにしてたの、
甜花も……見てた、から……えと、その……
trans: Tenka sees that... you're also really... looking forward to this... so, umm...

name: 甜花
text: なーちゃんと甜花だけで……行ってみる……？
trans: Would you like to go... with just Tenka there?

name: 甘奈
text: えっ……？
trans: Eh?

name: 甜花
text: ふたりだけだと……心配されると……思うけど……
trans: Although... Tenka thinks Papa and Mama would get worried...  about the idea of just us going on a trip...

name: 甜花
text:
て、甜花……
パパとママに……お願いしてみる！
trans: T-Tenka... will try asking... them about this!

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃん……！
trans: Tenka...

name: 甘奈
text:
えへへ、ありがと！
でも、それならお願いは一緒にしてみよ！
trans: Ehehe, thanks! But, let's try asking them together!

name: 甜花
text: うん
trans: Okay.

name: 甘奈
text: じゃあ、今夜帰ってきたら聞いてみよっか！
trans: Let's try asking them once they come back home tonight!

name: 甘奈
text: おはよう、千雪さん！
trans: Good morning, Chiyuki!

name: 甜花
text: おはよう……千雪さん
trans: Good morning... Chiyuki.

name: 千雪
text: 甘奈ちゃん甜花ちゃん、おはよう
trans: Amana, Tenka, good morning.

name: 甘奈
text: ねえ、千雪さん次のオフ空いてる！？
trans: Say, Chiyuki, are you free on the next day-off?

name: 千雪
text:
？　特に予定は決めてないけど……
どうかしたの？
trans: I don't really have any plans yet. What's the matter?

name: 甘奈
text: 一緒に旅行行こう！
trans: Let's go on a trip!

name: 千雪
trans: A trip?

name: 千雪
text:
なるほど……そういうことだったの
ご両親がお仕事で、旅行に行けなくなってしまったのね
trans: I see. So, that's what happened. Because of your parents' work, they won't be able to join you two for the trip.

name: 甘奈
text: うん！　心配されそうだからダメだと思ったんだけどね
trans: Yes! I thought that they won't approve since it going to make them worry.

name: 甘奈
text:
ふたりの都合で甘奈たちの楽しみがなくなっちゃうのは
悪いからって、オッケーしてくれたんだ！
trans: But, they felt bad that the trip we've been looking forward to will turn for naught, so they're okay with the idea!

name: 千雪
text: ふふ、優しいご両親ね
trans: Fufu, my, what nice parents.

name: 甜花
text: パパ、広いお部屋取ってたから……
trans: Papa booked a wide room so...

name: 甘奈
text:
お世話になってる千雪さんも誘ったら？　
って言ってくれたの☆
trans: He suggested that we invite you too since you're always taking good care of us.

name: 甘奈
text: だから、一緒に行こう！　千雪さん！
trans: So, let's go there together, Chiyuki!

name: 甜花
text:
千雪さんとなら……
きっと、もっと……楽しい……
trans: If you were with us... Tenka thinks that... the trip will be more fun...

name: 千雪
text:
……ふたりがそう言ってくれるなら、
お言葉に甘えちゃおうかな
trans: Hearing that from the two of us, I guess I'll take up your offer then.

name: 千雪
text: 素敵なお誘い、ありがとう。とっても嬉しい
trans: Thank you for this. I'm really happy you invited me.

name: 甘奈&甜花
text: やった！
trans: Yeah!

name: 甘奈
text: 決まりだね☆　今からめっちゃ楽しみだよ～
trans: It's settled then. I really can't wait for it.
